title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, September 5, 2020
description: The classic novel,"On The Road" was published on this day in 1957. Jack Kerouac based his novel on road trips with his friend Neal Cassady.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: The classic novel,"On The Road" was published on this day in 1957. Jack Kerouac based his novel on road trips with his friend Neal Cassady.
